price: 36. Of hebben zij de hemelen en de aarde geschapen? Nee, maar zij zijn er niet van overtuigd.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
